channel.title: Griefs on smaller infinity
channel.description: Recent content in Griefs on smaller infinity

item.title: Maggie Dream
item.description: Last night, I dreamt of Maggie. It was the regular disjointed dream, mostly. I don’t remember lots of it. But in the end, I was at the Wagner Mall in Bend, but like it was when I was a kid. I was in a store that I think I owned, and my Mom was there and the kids. Maggie came in and was talking and piddling around doing stuff, but it was a sidebar to what was going on in the dream.
